remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现 和 。This class implements and . 方法和 方法返回此类的实例。Instances of this class are returned from the method and from the method. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，由生成的[实体数据模型向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5). 下面的示例从 方法返回一个 。The following example returns an from the method. 然后，获取一个枚举器并循环访问查询结果。Then it gets an enumerator and iterates through the query results. 最后，释放枚举器和 对象。At the end, it releases the enumerator and the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭包含查询结果的 。Closes the , which contains the results of the query. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例从 方法返回一个 。The example returns an from the method. 然后，获取一个枚举器并循环访问查询结果。Then it gets an enumerator and iterates through the query results. 最后，释放枚举器和 对象。At the end, it releases the enumerator and the object. Public Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator(Of T)

summary.span: 返回一个循环访问查询结果的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the query results.

returns.span: 一个循环访问查询结果的枚举器。

span.span: An enumerator that iterates through the query results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不再需要枚举器，则必须将其释放。The enumerator must be disposed when no longer needed. 使用`foreach`语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 可确保访问结果的迭代完成后正确释放枚举器。Using the `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic) ensures that the enumerator is correctly disposed when iteration over the results is complete. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例从 方法返回一个 。The example returns an from the method. 然后，获取一个枚举器并循环访问查询结果。Then it gets an enumerator and iterates through the query results. 最后，释放枚举器和 对象。At the end, it releases the enumerator and the object.
